mention.text: the strategy of dialogue advocated by the opposition 's democratic sectors
mir spokesman jecar neghme talked to the press yesterday about the resolutions
the first meeting held in chile since july 1973
the document released by the 16 political parties
why the mir supports the registration of a leftist party : to prevent the exclusion of the left and `` to promote the gains of the people
